Remi Aduke Adedeji (amuru ya n’afọ 1937) bu onye ode-akwukwọ nke umuaka nke Naijiria
Amuru Adedeji na Okemesi na Ekiti Steeti n'afọ 1937
Obi adịghị Adedeji mma maka akwụkwọ ụmụaka maka na ha anaghị egosi omenaala ndị Africa
Ọtụtụ n’ime akụkọ ya sitere na akụkọ ọdịnala ndị Naịjirịa
O dere ma bipụta Nwanyi ahụ mara abụba n'afọ 1973
Ọ bụrụla onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ agụmakwụkwọ, Bookbird
Akwụkwọ ya nke 1986 nke "Moonlight Stories" nwere ọtụtụ akụkọ Just-so nke kọwara ihe mere udele jiri nwee isi maọbụ ihe mere  okpokoro mbe ji  yie ihe gbawara agbawa
